0: Very nice hotel lovely breakfast convenient location
Good value for money overall apart from Opus one plus anomalies in prices of drinks between that and the other restaurant
I would recommend this to anyone Great atmosphere in the dining and bar areas Wonderful pool sauna steam room facilities Will most certainly be staying again Staff were very courteous and helpful
The orange juice and coffee were good and I had the eggs benedict from the menu which was delicious
A good restaurant and bar in the hotel
Breakfast the next morning was everything you could wish for again the staff were excellent
We had a drink at the Opus Bar pleasant enough

The facilities of the hotel are first class the restaurants for both dinner and breakfast served an excellent choice of food The business centre was well equipped and useful for printing of boarding passes etc Would return again
The bar was great and later we ate at the lobster and steak restaurant
Great breakfast and polite and friendly service
1: The Opus bar staff were very good and really friendly but we struggled to get a seat in the bar both Friday and Saturday evenings as it appeared full of people who were not resident
Bar is of the highest quality
He located my jacket at the railway station found a black concierge jacket that I could borrow then collected my jacket from the station so that it was in my room when I returned after dinner
The first incident was when myself and two friends were dining in your Steak and Lobster restaurant after enjoying the spa facilities
We went for a meal at Opus One
The restaurant makes good burgers and superior hand cut chips
A new breakfast area had just opened and coffee and toast arrived after I had finished breakfast
We ate in the new restaurant Peters Kitchen on the Saturday evening
Received a complimentary breakfast as a gesture of goodwill due to it being our anniversary as well as a surprise commemorative cake when we entered our room
2: Comfortable bar area although the dining area was rather odd situated in an area enclosed by a wooden fence type structure
Customers and guests who go in there are ignored and not welcomed by the staff as the staff are too busy talking to each other and making drinks orders for diners
I had asked the previous day for a takeaway bag as I head to leave at 6 am breakfast does not start until 7 am

Quality of stay suited US The circa 4 pm drillings in adjacent rooms we should not have had to e Breakfast was excellent the fact that the website did not refer to it as either included or extra was poor and misleading cost was not cheap but quality very good but how any self respecting food outlet can CHOOSE to serve hot food on cold plates defeats this ex Hotelier customer
Noisy room not cleaned property mini bar empty
parking a little tricky though if driving breakfast exceptional
We did not realise that the hotel bar turned into a nightclub type environment in the evening
Despite this I still enjoyed the breakfast and I would recommend the hotel to anyone staying in Manchester
Expensive romsComplications over free breakfast as it was through Bokingcom
Took 15mins for our drinks to arrive at the hotel bar
